title: Submit Ad for Review
description: A designer has finished creating a new set of ads and needs to submit them to the client for approval.

tasks.description: Export the final ad creatives in the required format (e.g., JPG, PNG).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates the final ad files.

tasks.description: Upload the creatives to a project management or proofing tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uploads the files for client review.

tasks.description: Notify the client that the ads are ready for their review and feedback.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a notification to the client.
